title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 October 2012 - XWiki
content:
09:50 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <dirk\_schmitt> So I can't check if there was any useful  feedback to my deprecation log message topic.  
09:50 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Isn't there a "restart the bot" step in the xwikiorg upgrade plan?  
09:51 <vmassol> sdumitriu: 2 mn  
09:53 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:54 <sdumitriu> has quit  
10:01 <pgmjsd> has quit  
10:02 <pgmjsd> has joined #xwiki  
10:27 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
17:25 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
17:25 <@sdumitriu> Really, is there no "restart the bot" step in the xwikiorg update plan?  
17:27 <sburjan> has quit  
17:31 <vmassol> sdumitriu: wait  
17:32 <vmassol> I'm uprading to the new ircbot app  
17:32 <vmassol> which has this feature  
17:32 <vmassol> that's one of the reason I wanted to upgrade xwiki.org to 4.2  
17:32 <vmassol> (which I did yesterday)  
17:50 <vmassol> please don't touch the bot  
17:50 <vmassol> from now on
